meanings.definition: Oozes: (verb) flows slowly in a steady stream
meanings.sent1: The syrup ooses out of the bottle.
meanings.sent2: The chocolate ooses down the sides of the cake.
meanings.sent3: The melted ice cream ooses over the cone.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness ooses from every action she takes.
meanings.sent5: The lava ooses from the volcano, creating a dangerous situation.

meanings.definition: Oozes: (noun) a slow, steady flow of a liquid
meanings.sent1: The ooses of honey dripped slowly from the jar.
meanings.sent2: The ooses of water from the faucet were soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent3: The ooses of paint on the canvas created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent4: The ooses of oil on the road made it slippery for cars.
meanings.sent5: The ooses of tears from her eyes showed her deep emotion.

meanings.definition: Oozes: (adjective) having a soft, wet, and slightly sticky texture
meanings.sent1: The ooses mud squished under their boots.
meanings.sent2: The ooses dough was perfect for making cookies.
meanings.sent3: The ooses jelly stuck to the roof of his mouth.
meanings.sent4: The ooses clay was easy to mold into shapes.
meanings.sent5: The ooses slime felt cool and slippery in her hands.
